reviewText: In reviewing these training discs, I have learned more than imagined. Gary is so precise and clear in his teaching approach that anyone will be able to master this program.

Gary Kleiner's knowledge of Vegas 6 and DVD Architect is encyclopedic. His real talent is being able to convey that knowledge to the average person in a way that sticks. Aspiring DVD Authors would do well to pay close attention to this training course.
